mapper.sql: id_, device_code, device_type, add_user, add_time, user_, IMEI_
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from biz_device
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_device
id_,
device_code,
device_type,
add_user,
add_time,
user_,
IMEI_,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deviceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{user,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{imei,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.select: select count(*) from biz_device
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_device
id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_ = #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMEI_ = #{imei,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WHERE id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update biz_device
id_ = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_code = #{record.deviceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_user = #{record.addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_ = #{record.user,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IMEI_ = #{record.imei,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update biz_device set id_ = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_code = #{record.deviceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_user = #{record.addUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_ = #{record.user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IMEI_ = #{record.imei,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select device.id_ AS id, device.device_code AS code, type.name_ AS name, device.IMEI_ AS imei, user_.username_ AS username, user_.phone_num AS userPhoneNum FROM biz_device device LEFT JOIN biz_user user_ ON device.user_=user_.id_ LEFT JOIN biz_device_type type ON device.device_type = type.type_code WHERE
user_.username_ LIKE #{keyword} or user_.phone_num LIKE #{keyword} or type.name_ LIKE #{keyword}

select device.id_ AS id, device.device_code AS code, type.name_ AS name, device.IMEI_ AS imei, type.type_code AS type, user_.username_ AS username, user_.phone_num AS userPhoneNum FROM biz_device device LEFT JOIN biz_user user_ ON device.user_=user_.id_ LEFT JOIN biz_device_type type ON device.device_type = type.type_code WHERE device.user_ = #{userId}
SELECT MONTH(add_time) x, COUNT(1) y FROM biz_device WHERE YEAR(add_time)=#{time} AND device_type=#{typeCode} GROUP BY x ORDER BY x
SELECT DAY(add_time) x, COUNT(1) y FROM biz_device where YEAR(add_time)=#{year} AND MONTH(add_time)=#{month} AND device_type=#{typeCode} GROUP BY x ORDER BY x
SELECT WEEK(add_time,1) x, COUNT(1) y FROM biz_device where YEAR(add_time)=#{time} AND device_type=#{typeCode} GROUP BY x ORDER BY x
